welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Desamparados, a charming city known for its lush greenery and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore our beautiful city and experience all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tobias Bolaños International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Tobias Bolaños International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Juan Santamaría International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at Juan Santamaría International Airport serves flights to and from other Central American countries.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Guapiles Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Guapiles Airport handles the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.
